title: MBMBaM 630: Face 2 Face: Alabaster Hawk, Governor of the Thirteenth
description:
Live (at the time) from The Balboa Theater for San Diego Comic Con, it’s a very fancy episode. You see, San Diego Comic Con was a live show that featured discussions of touching orbs, making small talk with people who have more interesting jobs than you, and revealing the secret pants under your regular pants.

Suggested talking points: The Sky, Right?, Old Mug with picture of train, Big Hot Spill, Sqütty Pöoty, 69% Sword Discount, Space Jam Horcruxes

Fair Elections Center: https://www.fairelectionscenter.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy)
